title: Assistant Professor
biography: I am an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC). My research lies in computer vision, machine learning, and robotics, with a specific focus on open-world perception, meta-learning, multi-modal learning, generative modeling, and agent learning.
